alert.note: Alert for Washington (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 13 at 6:22PM CDT until April 13 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN CHICOT...SOUTHEASTERN ASHLEY AND SOUTHERN WASHINGTON COUNTIES... At 622 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Avon, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Hollandale and Estill around 630 PM CDT. Darlove around 640 PM CDT. Murphy around 645 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southeastern Arkansas...and central, northwestern and west central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
